findings.title: Improperly Pinned GitHub Actions
findings.description: The GitHub Actions workflows use several third-party actions pinned to a tag or branch name instead of a full commit SHA.

findings.title: Password Policy Issues
findings.description: Password policy on backups does not have a secure standard.

findings.title: Infinite Errors Loop
findings.description: One functionality issue led to an infinite error loop.

findings.title: Static AES-GCM Nonce
findings.description: A static nonce is used for cloud backup encryption.

findings.title: Insecure Algorithm Usage
findings.description: Argon2i is used instead of Argon2id, which would be more secure for the mobile wallet.

findings.title: Lack of Minimum Security Policy
findings.description: Authentication and access control mechanisms lack a minimum security policy.

findings.title: Insecure Password Policy on Backups
findings.description: Password policy on backups does not have a secure standard.

findings.title: Inconsistent Application Settings with System Biometric Settings
findings.description: Application settings are inconsistent with the system biometric settings, which can lead to a situation where the application is not protected by biometrics.

findings.title: Bypassable Local Biometric Authentication
findings.description: Local biometric authentication may be bypassed.

findings.title: Misconfigured Android Manifest Configuration
findings.description: Android Manifest configuration could make the application more robust.

findings.title: Misconfigured Logging in OneSignal SDK Exposes Debuggable WebViews
findings.description: Misconfigured logging in the OneSignal SDK exposes debuggable WebViews.

findings.title: Wallet Does Not Conform to BIP44 Specification
findings.description: The wallet does not conform to the BIP44 specification.

findings.title: Lack of Certificate Pinning
findings.description: There is unimplemented certificate pinning.

findings.title: Minor Bug due to Lazy Validation in Initial Views
findings.description: Transaction amounts are obscured and lazily validated in initial views.

findings.title: Outdated SDKs Imported by the Application
findings.description: Some SDKs imported by the application are outdated.

findings.title: Minor Issue with Error Handling
findings.description: Error messages should be unified.

findings.title: Lack of a Minimum Device-Access Security Policy
findings.description: The wallet does not enforce a minimum device-access security policy.

findings.title: Biometric Not Enabled for Application Access After Enrollment
findings.description: Only transaction signing is enabled, and users are not informed about the separate setting for application access.

findings.title: Wallet Sends Requests with Private Data Before Unlock
findings.description: The application starts fetching profile information over the network before being unlocked by biometric or PIN authentication.

findings.title: Plaintext Private Keys in RAM
findings.description: Private keys may be kept unencrypted in RAM until the application is closed.
findings.location: RnEthersRs class in Uniswap Android mobile wallet

findings.title: BIP44 Spec Is Not Followed
findings.description: The Uniswap mobile wallet automatically imports at most the first 10 wallets associated with a mnemonic, instead of following the BIP44 specification.

findings.title: SafetyNet Verify Apps API Not Implemented in the Android Client
findings.description: The Uniswap Android application does not use the SafetyNet Verify Apps API.

findings.title: Leakage of Data to Third-Party
findings.description: The Uniswap mobile wallet shares device-specific information with third-party entities, including OneSignal, Sentry, and Google Services.
findings.location: Uniswap Android application, Uniswap iOS application

findings.title: Incorrect Comment
findings.description: The comment in the getNextDerivationIndex function is incorrect.

findings.title: Deprecated Method Usage
findings.description: The RnEthersRs classâ€™ init method uses a deprecated version of the EncryptedSharedPreferences.create method.

findings.title: Insecure Currency ID Validation
findings.description: The IDs should contain only one dash, but this property is never validated.

findings.title: Insecure URL Parsing and Manipulation
findings.description: URLs are parsed and manipulated using simple string-manipulation functions instead of designated URL-aware methods.

findings.title: Lack of Camera Access Explanation
findings.description: The application does not provide an explanation for camera access in the Privacy Dashboard.

findings.title: Metrics Collection Opt-out
findings.description: WebViews can upload anonymous diagnostic data to Google when the user consents, but the application does not opt out of this feature.

findings.title: Advertising ID Permission
findings.description: The application and its third-party SDKs can target users through the Advertising ID.
